settings.title: Settings
settings.currentDeviceNotSubscribed: Current device is not subscribed to notifications.
settings.noSubscriptionsPrompt: No notification subscription on any device. This is OboApp's main purpose. Subscribe!
settings.notificationsNotSupported:
Unfortunately, this browser does not support notifications.

On iOS Safari, you need to add the app to your home screen before you can receive notifications.
settings.notificationsBlocked:
Notifications are blocked in your browser. To enable them:

1. Click on the lock/info icon next to the address bar
2. Find notification settings
3. Allow notifications for this site
4. Reload the page
settings.pleaseAllowNotifications: Please allow notifications in your browser
settings.unsubscribeAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from all devices?

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.confirmationRequired: This action is irreversible. Type DELETE to confirm

zones.empty: You have no zones of interest.

messages.loadError: An error occurred while loading categories. Category filter may not work correctly.

aria.swipeToClose: Swipe to close, or tap to close

notificationPrompt.title: Get notifications
notificationPrompt.note: After that, you can add zones of interest and receive notifications about events in them.

loginPrompt.title: Track local messages
loginPrompt.description: Sign in, subscribe, and get notifications when there are messages for the zones you're interested in.

subscribePrompt.title: No notification subscription
subscribePrompt.description: You have zones of interest, but you're not subscribed to notifications. This is OboApp's main purpose!

addInterestsPrompt.title: Track selected zones
addInterestsPrompt.description: Choose places that matter to you and get notifications when there's something new there.

geolocationPrompt.title: Show my location
geolocationPrompt.description: Would you like us to center the map on your current location?
geolocationPrompt.note: We won't use it for anything else. You can revoke access at any time in your browser settings.

blockedNotifications.title: Notifications are blocked
blockedNotifications.description: Your browser or device does not allow notifications. You can enable them from your browser settings.

messageDetail.title: Signal Details
messageDetail.mapObjectsCount: {count} {count, plural, one {object} other {objects}} on the map

notifications.title: Notification History

prompt.geolocation: We won't use it for anything else. You can revoke access anytime in your browser settings.
prompt.blocked: Your browser or device doesn't allow notifications. You can enable them in your browser settings.
